description: Say goodbye to slow internet speeds and hello to lightning-fast browsing with Kazwire.

settings.description: Adjust settings on Kazwire as you see fit. These settings are stored in your browser's local storage, so they will persist across sessions.

school_rescue.description: Looks like you might be at school, so we are just checking if you would like to utilize our cloaking feature! This will make the tab appear to be from a different website, so you can use the site safely at school.
school_rescue.tip_part_2: your keyboard to show a fake Google Doc!

faq.p_1: Are you looking for a new place to play your favorite online games? Look no further! Our online gaming site is the perfect destination for gamers of all levels and interests.
faq.p_2: With a wide variety of games to choose from, including popular titles like Run 3, Slope, and Retro Bowl, as well as many of lesser-known games in a variety of genres, there's something for everyone on our site.
faq.p_3_part_1: We also give you the ability to browse the entire internet if you don't like what you see! If you ever need help please join our
faq.p_4: Games shown in this website are the property of their respective owners. If you see your game here and would like it removed please refer to our

discord.instructions: To access our Discord you can view it through Kazwire or you can choose to visit the URL directly.
